alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Jasper (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 17 at 4:52PM CST until February 17 at 5:30PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Jasper County in east central Mississippi... Northwestern Clarke County in east central Mississippi... * Until 530 PM CST. * At 452 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Turnerville, or 11 miles northeast of Stringer, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Paulding around 500 PM CST. Orange and Rose Hill around 510 PM CST. Stonewall around 520 PM CST. Sable around 530 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Pachuta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
